about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling interstellar journey with your fuzzy co-pilot in this exhilarating space adventure game. As your furry friend is a rookie in space exploration, your guidance and expertise will be crucial to navigate the perils of the cosmos.



Key Features

  • Master your spaceship: Pilot your craft with precision, utilizing your knowledge of physics and expert piloting skills to traverse the vastness of space.
  • Protect your companion: Keep a watchful eye on your furry sidekick as you maneuver through obstacles, shielding them from harm by blocking incoming debris with your ship or guiding them to safety.
  • Laser gun at your disposal: Utilize your spaceship's laser gun to blast away incoming space debris, clearing a path for both you and your fuzzy friend.
  • Docking capabilities: Invite your companion to dock their ship with yours, allowing them to experience the awe-inspiring wonders of the universe up close and personal.
  • Unforgettable cosmic journey: Explore the breathtaking beauty of outer space with your furry companion by your side, creating lasting memories as you uncover the mysteries of the cosmos together.

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure, piloting your ship and safeguarding your endearing partner as you uncover the marvels of the universe!

  • Protect your companion: Keep a watchful eye on your furry sidekick as you maneuver through obstacles, shielding them from harm by blocking incoming debris with your ship or guiding them to safety.
  • Laser gun at your disposal: Utilize your spaceship's laser gun to blast away incoming space debris, clearing a path for both you and your fuzzy friend.
  • Docking capabilities: Invite your companion to dock their ship with yours, allowing them to experience the awe-inspiring wonders of the universe up close and personal.
  • Unforgettable cosmic journey: Explore the breathtaking beauty of outer space with your furry companion by your side, creating lasting memories as you uncover the mysteries of the cosmos together.

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure, piloting your ship and safeguarding your endearing partner as you uncover the marvels of the universe!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5-4570S
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GT 750M or equivalent AMD® card with 1GB Vram
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5-4670
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 780M with 4GB Vram or AMD® Radeon™ R7 370 (2 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Stellar Stroll

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore the cosmos with your furry friend and collect antimatter to open portals to different celestial worlds. Use gravity and momentum to navigate through planets, asteroids, and comets while avoiding black holes and space debris.
